metadata.dc:author: Pérez Arbej, J A
Martínez Pérez, E
Arnaiz Esteban, F
Nogueras Gimeno, M A
Arevalo Velasco, J M
Guinda Sevillano, C
Espuela Orgaz, R
metadata.dc:description: Explanation of one case of abscessified brucellar prostatitis in a 44-year old patient. The emphasis is placed on the high incidence of brucellosis in the province of Soria and the rarity of the prostatic location of this condition. Also, a revision is made of the diagnostic methodology and current therapeutical approaches. The crucial role of the endocavitary ultrasound techniques both for diagnosis as well as treatment and case follow-up is highlighted.
metadata.dc:title: Prostatitis brucelar abscesificada. Una localización poco frecuente.
[Abscessed brucellar prostatitis. An infrequent location].
